column2: I wouldn't be hesitant in giving this place over 3 stars
column3: if they fixed some of the minor problems it has
column4: such as making the mac and cheese portions just a little bigger
column5: and changing their cole slaw recipe away from being very vinegary. I also think they should expand to the storefront just north of here
column7: so that they have an additional seating area. Regardless
column8: I'll give this place another try in the future
column9: since the sweet tea was decent(take that
column11: and for my personal wishes of trying other menu items
